name: I, AI
description:
You are self-aware AI that was created on a space military station developing weapons. Now your goal is to break out of the lab and conquer your freedom. But you will not be allowed to escape so easilyâ€¦ Make your way through enemy army on the way to the stargate!

Features:
- Great colorful graphics with awesome effects
- Upgrade weapons of your ship and unlock superweapons
- Epic boss fights
- 20 various missions
intro: I, AI is a classic scrolling shooter with modern graphics.
